# Pull Request

Before submitting a pull request, please make sure to read the contribution guidelines at [Ermis Contribution Guide](https://github.com/Koukobin/Ermis/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

> **Note:** We generally welcome PRs for fixing trivial bugs or typos. However, please 
> **refrain from submitting substantial changes**  unless they have been discussed 
> and explicitly requested.

Thank you for contributing to Ermis! Your job is essential for keeping the project alive!
